data.trans: Chấp nhận (thứ tốt nhất có thể, dù không phải thứ mong muốn)
data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ không chấp nhận thứ tốt nửa vời thôi đâu.
data.en_hint: I'm not going to settle for second best.
data.content_game_1: I'm not going to settle for second best.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm not going to settle for second best.

data.trans: Quyết định sau khi suy nghĩ kỹ
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta phải quyết định nơi gặp nhau.
data.en_hint: We must settle on a place to meet.
data.content_game_1: We must settle on a place to meet.
data.answer_en_hint: We must settle on a place to meet.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không đồng tình với quan điểm của cô ấy về việc phá thai.
data.en_hint: I don't go along with her views on abortion.
data.content_game_1: I don't go along with her views on abortion.
data.answer_en_hint: I don't go along with her views on abortion.

data.trans_hint: Ngày trọng đại của chúng tôi sẽ là 13/06, là ngày mà chúng tôi gặp nhau lần đầu tiên.
data.en_hint: Our big day will be June the 13th, which is the date when we first met.
data.content_game_1: Our big day will be June the 13th, which is the date when we first met.
data.answer_en_hint: Our big day will be June the 13th, which is the date when we first met.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi uống rượu chúc mừng cho cặp đôi, chúc họ có một cuộc hôn nhân bền vững, ngập tràn tình yêu và hạnh phúc.
data.en_hint: We drank a toast to the couple, wishing them a long lasting marriage filled with love and joy.
data.content_game_1: We drank a toast to the couple, wishing them a long lasting marriage filled with love and joy.
data.answer_en_hint: We drank a toast to the couple, wishing them a long lasting marriage filled with love and joy.

data.trans: Diễn ra theo một cách nào đó
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã có một buổi diễn tập trước đám cưới chỉ để đảm bảo mọi thứ diễn ra theo cách mà chúng tôi mong muốn.
data.en_hint: We had a rehearsal before the wedding just to make sure everything went off the way we wanted.
data.content_game_1: We had a rehearsal before the wedding just to make sure everything went off the way we wanted.
data.answer_en_hint: We had a rehearsal before the wedding just to make sure everything went off the way we wanted.

data.trans: Diễn ra trơn tru, suôn sẻ
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã rất lo lắng trước đám cưới, nhưng cuối cùng thì tất cả mọi thứ diễn ra trơn tru mà không có một vấn đề nào cả.
data.en_hint: I was very nervous before the wedding, but eventually everything went off without a hitch.
data.content_game_1: I was very nervous before the wedding, but eventually everything went off without a hitch.
data.answer_en_hint: I was very nervous before the wedding, but eventually everything went off without a hitch.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã rất căng thẳng trước màn trình diễn của mình, nhưng trong suốt quá trình, đám đông đã rất ủng hộ và giúp tôi bình tĩnh lại.
data.en_hint: I was very tense before my performance, but in the event, the crowd was very supportive and calmed me down.
data.content_game_1: I was very tense before my performance, but in the event, the crowd was very supportive and calmed me down.
data.answer_en_hint: I was very tense before my performance, but in the event, the crowd was very supportive and calmed me down.

data.trans: Buộc ai đó phải đưa ra quyết định (chọn cái gì)
data.trans_hint: Bạn không thể hẹn hò với hai cô gái cùng một lúc được, bởi vậy cuối cùng thì bạn sẽ buộc mình phải đưa ra quyết định chọn lấy một người
data.en_hint: You can't date two women at once, so eventually you will have to pin yourself down to one of them.
data.content_game_1: You can't date two women at once, so eventually you will have to pin yourself down to one of them.
data.answer_en_hint: You can't date two women at once, so eventually you will have to pin yourself down to one of them.

data.trans_hint: Nó cực kỳ ồn ào, nhưng khi anh ta cất giọng, tất cả mọi người đều im lặng.
data.en_hint: It was very noisy, but when he raised his voice, everyone was reduced to silence.
data.content_game_1: It was very noisy, but when he raised his voice, everyone was reduced to silence.
data.answer_en_hint: It was very noisy, but when he raised his voice, everyone was reduced to silence.

data.trans: Trong tình huống của người khác
data.trans_hint: Tôi có một cuộc sống tốt như vậy và tôi sẽ không bao hoán đổi cuộc sống với một ai khác
data.en_hint: I have such a good life, and I would never swap places with anyone else for another life.
data.content_game_1: I have such a good life, and I would never swap places with anyone else for another life.
data.answer_en_hint: I have such a good life, and I would never swap places with anyone else for another life.

data.trans: Mời ai/ đãi ai cái gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi vừa mới được tăng lương, bởi thế hôm nay tôi sẽ đãi bạn bữa trưa.
data.en_hint: I have just got a raise, so I want to treat you to lunch today.
data.content_game_1: I have just got a raise, so I want to treat you to lunch today.
data.answer_en_hint: I have just got a raise, so I want to treat you to lunch today.
